about_the_game:
Welcome to "FarmCraft" - one of the most addictive Farming games!


It's time to get your hands dirty in this addictive farm management game that pits farm girl Ginger against a big agricultural conglomerate.
Build and design your farm to meet any needs and hone your skills of growing plants, harvesting, animal husbandry and farm manage to earn FarmCraft awards as you encounter challenging scenarios in each new level!

Once upon a time, in a small, faraway village, there was a special girl. You will become the greatest farmer of our time and you'll save us from the onslaught of heavy industry!
Old granny was losing her mind in her old age, but she was right about this. Even in her infancy, the little girl showed a strong aptitude in farming. Ginger had a great future ahead of her.
Now feel the strength within you, my young lady, and till that soil!

Farm Craft is a tale of good vs. evil. Our hero, Ginger, helps various rural farmers take on the AgroCorporation that wants to develop the land outside of town.
It's up to Ginger to keep her farm and save the village (heck, the whole county is counting on her). Don't be afraid to get your hands dirty in this addictive time-management game that digs its way into the farming, flower, livestock, and beekeeping businesses. It's charming farming!


Main features:
- Excellent art
- Fun, addictive play
- Build and design your farm to meet your needs
- New and challenging elements added with each level
- Hone your skills to earn all 12 awards

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows XP/ 7/ 10 or later version
  • Processor: 1 GHz
  • Memory: 2048 MB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
  • Sound Card: built-in
